featured.text: Ancient cultures celebrated New Year’s Day on or around April 1, which roughly coincides with the beginning of spring.
A typical room of a capsule hotel is roughly the length and width of a single bed, with sufficient height for a guest to crawl in and sit up on the bed.

definition.en_def: Approximately; in a general or imprecise manner.
definition.example: The project will take roughly three months to complete.
